name: @yousolution/node-red-contrib-you-tunnel-ssh
description: Module to create ssh tunnel for NODE-RED

scripts.update: npm pack && mv yousolution-node-red-contrib-you-tunnel-ssh-$npm_package_version.tgz ./data && cd data && npm i yousolution-node-red-contrib-you-tunnel-ssh-$npm_package_version.tgz && docker-compose restart

author: Andrea Trentin <andrea.trentin@yousolution.cloud>
